Exaggerate: The claim of Canada welcoming 3 million immigrants in 2020 is an exaggeration as the Canadian government has stated that they plan on welcoming about 341,000 immigrants.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Canadian government has no plan to welcome 3 million immigrants in 2020.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on an article shared on multiple websites, some of which have been debunked in the past.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it is based on misleading information shared on websites administered by individuals in Kosovo.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the Canadian government has a plan to welcome 3 million immigrants in 2020, despite evidence to the contrary.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by the Canadian government spokesperson, who states that the plan is to welcome around 341,000 immigrants in 2020.
